freelance.title: Senior Software Engineer
freelance.description_1: Developed fullstack applications for hospitality and recreational industries, including reservation systems and activity management platforms. Enhanced understanding and application of SOLID principles, implementing them more effectively across projects to improve code maintainability and scalability.
freelance.description_2: Led a small development team to successfully rescue a recreation application from near-failed implementation, delivering a functional solution within timeline. Implemented AI workflow automation solutions using n8n, developed web scraping solutions, and managed AWS cloud services including Aurora RDS, Route 53, EC2, and SES.

0.title: Technical Lead
0.description_1: Responsible for the Operation Center platform, the main core of the post-purchase experience section. Also collaborated with a team supporting a unified UI component library to improve and centralize frontend development homogeneity regarding components.
0.description_2: Achieved a potential 30% cost reduction in third-party dependent services.

1.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
1.description_1: Responsible for refactoring and updating a platform based on Webpack with Module Federation (micro-frontend), establishing the foundation for migration for different team apps within the company's post-purchase experience ecosystem.
1.description_2: Additionally, improvements were made to a native library that enables orchestration and execution of webpack-react-based apps in the micro-frontend, allowing for resolution and navigation.

2.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
2.description_1: Led a frontend development team for a social network-based platform, providing guidance on best development practices, time management, and planning of sprint activities and short, medium, and long-term goals.
2.description_2: Also supervised best practices and clean code in the frontend, enabling more agile and dynamic development, fostering teamwork and pair programming, and establishing effective communication behaviors. Encouraged the setting of goals and objectives that reduced development times by 30%, achieving the release of the first 2 MVPs efficiently.

3.title: Frontend Engineer => Frontend Lead
3.description_1: Recruited frontend developers and UX/UI designers, ensuring continuity for new developments and features in the app during my time as Technical Lead Frontend. Also developed new features in the frontend app based on VueJS technology, establishing scalability standards for new developments required by the planning team.
3.description_2: Led a migration with the frontend team from the VueJS platform to ReactJS, emphasizing clean code elements to enable scalability, thus reducing platform load times by up to 50%.

projects.meet_ai_desc: A sophisticated Next.js 15 fullstack application that enables users to create and interact with customizable AI agents. Built with a modern stack including tRPC, Drizzle ORM, and Better Auth. Features real-time video conversations, comprehensive conversation summaries with keyword highlighting, and persistent chat functionality. Integrates multiple services including Inngest for background tasks, Stream.io for chat/calls, Neon Database, OpenAI API for call processing, and Polar.sh for subscription management.
projects.nestjs_crm_desc: A modern NestJS CRUD application implementing a lightweight CRM system. Built with TypeScript and class-based SOLID principles, featuring clean architecture and comprehensive API documentation. Leverages AI tools for automated changelog generation and documentation management, demonstrating practical integration of AI in development workflows.
projects.laniakea_desc: E-commerce store prototype built with ReactJs, AntDesign, and Firebase. You can add products to the cart, view product details, and simulate a purchase.
projects.backend_title: Backend project with Express and Node.js
projects.backend_desc: Built with Express and Node.js, this project is a backend that allows CRUD operations on a MongoDB database, simulating a product list and a shopping cart.
projects.login_title: Login Project with Next.js and Tailwind CSS
projects.lazy_loading_desc: A comprehensive repository showcasing advanced lazy loading techniques for list items using pure JavaScript. Features infinite scroll, image optimization, and performance-focused solutions for modern web applications.
projects.backend_vanilla_desc: A comprehensive vanilla JavaScript demonstration showcasing best practices in folder structure, component orchestration, and architectural patterns. Features formal documentation structure and process workflows to maintain better development practices and code organization standards.
projects.nestjs_ecommerce_desc: A comprehensive NestJS e-commerce project built with TypeScript, implementing class-based SOLID principles and modern backend architecture. Features clean code practices, scalable design patterns, and robust API development without AI tools assistance. Includes comprehensive documentation and follows industry best practices.
projects.cicd_template_title: CI/CD Template - Husky, TypeScript & Linting Integration
projects.cicd_template_desc: A comprehensive development template designed to maintain proper code structure and standards for small to medium teams. Ensures code compatibility, enforces best practices, and maintains development consistency through automated workflows.
projects.portfolio_desc: This portfolio is built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, featuring multilanguage support, smooth scroll navigation, custom animated backgrounds, and a modern responsive UI.

hero.name: Amilcar Barahona

hero.description: With 10 years of software development expertise built through continuous self-directed learning, I have spearheaded transformative technical initiatives that deliver measurable business impact. As Technical Lead, I have successfully led and mentored small to medium-sized development teams, achieving significant results that enhanced team collaboration dynamics and improved overall project performance.
hero.description_2: The current AI revolution presents critical opportunities that demand strategic focus and attention. Key areas include implementing workflow automation solutions to enhance operational efficiency and leveraging code generation agents to significantly increase development velocity and code deliverability.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I have 10 years of experience as a software developer and autodidactic enthusiasm. I led FrontEnd development and supervised backend developments as Technical Lead at Cencosud S.A., successfully establishing a non-relational data model for the post-purchase experience sector.
aboutMe.paragraph2: This planning served as a starting point to develop a solid transversal base in micro-frontend technology, which allowed consolidating cost reduction objectives of up to 30% in relation to third-party dependent services, many of which lacked stability and operability affecting the purchasing flow for clients in the company.
